content:
Our new daily podcast gives you context and clarity on the stories shaping your world

AS AMERICA and Russia pull out of the INF, a cold war-era weapons treaty, we examine the picture of global stability without it. Our China columnist visits members of the Hui, a repressed Muslim minority spread throughout the country. And Europe launches a system to combat fake medicines—an expansive and expensive project that few think is necessary. Runtime: 19 min

ex: abbr. 中程核力量（Intermediate-range Nuclear Forces）

wp.INF File: 信息文件;适配器安装信息文件
wp.Inf Health: 无限生命;比如无限体力;限膂力;无限
wp.INF Treaty: 中导条约;中程核武器条约
wp.INF IMTERFERE: 由共同部分创建三维实体

ex: n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错
wp.Common Runtime: 公共运行时;语言和通用运行时;公共运行环境;运行库
wp.Runtime Database: 运行时数据库;运行数据库;分布式动态数据库
wp.runtime host: 运行时主机;执行阶段主机;库宿主
wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: 网络 专栏记者；名家专栏；报刊专栏作家
v. 战斗；防止；减轻；与…搏斗
网络 格斗；斗争；对抗
eg2: He was killed in combat .
他在战斗中阵亡。
armed/unarmed combat(= with/without weapons)
武装╱非武装对抗
combat troops
作战部队
combat boots
军靴
measures to combat crime/inflation/unemployment/disease
防止犯罪╱通货膨胀╱失业╱疾病的措施

ex: v. 崩溃；崩裂；瓦解；成碎屑
网络 弄碎；粉碎；破碎
eg2: Rice flour makes the cake less likely to crumble.
这种糕饼用米粉做不那么容易碎。
Crumble the cheese over the salad.
把干酪弄成碎屑洒在色拉上。
buildings crumbling into dust
渐渐坍塌的建筑物
crumbling stonework
不断破裂的石制建筑
The cliff is gradually crumbling away.
峭壁正在逐渐崩坍。
a crumbling business/relationship
逐渐衰败的企业；日益恶化的关系
All his hopes began to crumble away.
他所有的希望开始化为泡影。
The empire finally crumbled into dust.
这个帝国最终崩溃了。
apple crumble and custard
酥皮苹果甜点心加蛋奶沙司

ex: adj. 广阔的；扩张的；豪爽的

wp.expansive agent: 膨胀剂;膨胀剂膨胀剂;破石剂
wp.expansive delusion: 夸张妄想;展张性妄想;张大妄想

eg2: The Mulu Caves in Borneo are some of the most expansive on Earth.
婆罗洲的姆鲁岩洞是一些地球上最广阔的洞穴。
Behind both the moons and rings is giant Saturn itself, showing expansive but featureless clouds in the green light where the above image was taken.
而在土卫和土星环二者的后面是巨行星土星本身，(照片拍摄时在绿光波段?) 显示广阔却无特征的云层。
The left may have faith in the findings of think tanks, the right in the freedom of markets, but on this one, I want a more inclusive,  debate.
左派也许相信智囊团的发现，右派相信市场的自由性，但在这一件事上，我希望有一个更加包容性的、广阔的思索。

ex: vt. 抑制；镇压（叛乱等）；约束
eg2: So the police must repress these freedoms.
因此，警察必须镇压这些自由。
However, because they don’t have the emotional tools to integrate the hurt caused by abusive adults, they often  their feelings as their first line of defence.
但是，实际上他们并不具备情绪调节的能力，可以去平复成年人对其虐待造成的伤害，他们抑制自己的情感，作为第一道防线。
These hostilities against an abstract noun were used not only to fight abroad but also to repress at home.
对一个抽象名词的战争不仅用来在国外打仗也用来镇压国内。

wp.Emotional Stability: 情绪稳定性;情绪稳定;情绪的稳定性;情感的稳定性
wp.asymptotic stability: 渐近稳定性;渐进稳定性;渐近稳定度;渐近稳定
wp.price stability: 价格稳定;		物价稳定;物价稳定度;市价稳定性
wp.temperature stability: 温度稳定性;		温度稳定度;温度误差;温度波动
wp.color stability: 色彩稳定性;色稳定性;彩色稳定性;色稳性
wp.Dimensional stability: 尺寸稳定性;尺度安定性;尺寸安定性;		尺寸恒定性
wp.Dynamic Stability: 动态稳定性;动稳定;动力稳定性;动力稳定度
wp.frequency stability: 频率稳定度;		频率稳定性;频率稳定;温度频差
wp.storage stability: 贮存稳定性;储藏稳定性;储存稳定性;稳定性

eg2: While I certainly do not deny the importance of ensuring server , you have to balance the need for adequate testing with the need for adequate security.
尽管我当然不会否认确保服务器稳定性的重要性，但是你也得在合适的测试需要和恰当的安全需求之间做出平衡。
Any significant changes, however, should be deferred to a future generation of the solution to maintain its .
但是，任何重要的变更，应当被延迟到未来产生的解决方案，以维护其稳定性。
Peace and  in the world need the active involvement of China.
世界和平和稳定需有中国的积极参与。

Title: The INF treaty crumbles, China’s disappearing Muslims and a fake-medicine mess
